title: Loss prevented but still counted as a provisional?
body: The last game I played was a loss prevented game. However when I check my provisional status it still counts this as a game played towards my provisional. So will it be taken off my provisional status or what happens from here? Thanks in advanced.

replies.body: Just noticed something more bizarre, in the champs most played, the last champion I played, Amumu isn't on the list (even though I've only played two games this season)

Practically just had the same thing, our adc dced from 1:50 to the end, somehow we turtled til 35mins and it ended up being a loss prevented. I thought that would mean that It wouldn't count but sadly it did.. ugh. I'm in the same boat with you bro.
